#  Guide to Economic Data + Interactive Visualization in R {-}

_Version as of January 2018_ 

This guide provides easy and intuitive tutorials to visualizing economic data. It is an evolving document that will grow and be refined as new best practices are introduced. In the current version, two topics are covered: 

- Accessing economic data via the BEA API using a R Library
- Creating interactive maps
